io.itch.jaknak72.oozed.game.resources

Class ResourceSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.itch.jaknak72.oozed.game.resources.ResourceSystem

  • public class ResourceSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Don't keep this on Activity change Loads and stores all sprite bitmaps, gameplay music & sounds
    Author:
    jakob & simon
